name: mcp-server-aws-diagram
description: Create diagrams using the Python diagrams package: sequence, flow, and class diagrams.

rating.reason: All three tools have excellent documentation quality. Tool names are clear and specific, descriptions are comprehensive (3-4+ sentences) explaining functionality, usage scenarios, and important limitations. Parameters have detailed descriptions with clear purpose and expected values. The generate_diagram tool particularly excels with extensive usage instructions, code requirements, and common patterns. All tools proactively address user questions and provide step-by-step guidance.
